verses.verse: And you has he quickened, who were dead <S%G3498><s%> in trespasses <S%G3900><s%> and sins; <S%G266><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> in time <S%G4218><s%> past you walked <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the course <S%G165><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the prince <S%G758><s%> of the power <S%G1849><s%> of the air, <S%G109><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> that now <S%G3568><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in the children <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience: <S%G543><s%>

Among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we all <S%G3956><s%> had our conversation <S%G390><s%> in times <S%G4218><s%> past in the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of our flesh, <S%G4561><s%> fulfilling <S%G4160><s%> the desires <S%G2307><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> and of the mind; <S%G1271><s%> and were by nature <S%G5449><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of wrath, <S%G3709><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as others. <S%G3062><s%>
But God, <S%G2316><s%> who is rich <S%G4145><s%> in mercy, <S%G1656><s%> for his great <S%G4183><s%> love <S%G26><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> he loved <S%G25><s%> us,

Even <S%G2532><s%> when we were dead <S%G3498><s%> in sins, <S%G3900><s%> has quickened <S%G4806><s%> us together <S%G4806><s%> with Christ, <S%G5547><s%> (by grace <S%G5485><s%> you are saved; <S%G4982><s%>)

And has raised <S%G4891><s%> us up together, <S%G4891><s%> and made <S%G4776><s%> us sit <S%G4776><s%> together <S%G4776><s%> in heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

That in the ages <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G1904><s%> he might show <S%G1731><s%> the exceeding <S%G5235><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of his grace <S%G5485><s%> in his kindness <S%G5544><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> us through <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
For by grace <S%G5485><s%> are you saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> and that not of yourselves: <S%G5216><s%> it is the gift <S%G1435><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>
Not of works, <S%G2041><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man should boast. <S%G2744><s%>

For we are his workmanship, <S%G4161><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to good <S%G18><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has before <S%G4282><s%> ordained <S%G4282><s%> that we should walk <S%G4043><s%> in them.

Why <S%G1352><s%> remember, <S%G3421><s%> that you being in time <S%G4218><s%> past Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are called <S%G3004><s%> Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> by that which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> the Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> made <S%G5499><s%> by hands; <S%G5499><s%>

That at <S%G1722><s%> that time <S%G2540><s%> you were without <S%G5565><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> being aliens <S%G526><s%> from the commonwealth <S%G4174><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and strangers <S%G3581><s%> from the covenants <S%G1242><s%> of promise, <S%G1860><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> and without <S%G112><s%> God <S%G112><s%> in the world: <S%G2889><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> you who <S%G3739><s%> sometimes <S%G4218><s%> were far <S%G3112><s%> off <S%G3112><s%> are made <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> by the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For he is our peace, <S%G1515><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has made <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G297><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> and has broken <S%G3089><s%> down the middle <S%G3320><s%> wall of partition <S%G5418><s%> between us;

Having abolished <S%G2673><s%> in his flesh <S%G4561><s%> the enmity, <S%G2189><s%> even the law <S%G3551><s%> of commandments <S%G1785><s%> contained in ordinances; <S%G1378><s%> for to make <S%G2936><s%> in himself <S%G1438><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> so making <S%G4160><s%> peace; <S%G1515><s%>

And that he might reconcile <S%G604><s%> both <S%G297><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> by the cross, <S%G4716><s%> having slain <S%G615><s%> the enmity <S%G2189><s%> thereby: <S%G1722><s%>
And came <S%G2064><s%> and preached <S%G2097><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> to you which <S%G3588><s%> were afar <S%G3112><s%> off, and to them that were near. <S%G1451><s%>
For through <S%G1223><s%> him we both <S%G297><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> by one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> you are no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> and foreigners, <S%G3941><s%> but fellow citizens <S%G4847><s%> with the saints, <S%G40><s%> and of the household <S%G3609><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

And are built <S%G2026><s%> on the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> and prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> himself <S%G848><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> the chief <S%G204><s%> corner <S%G204><s%> stone;

In whom <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the building <S%G3619><s%> fitly <S%G4883><s%> framed <S%G4883><s%> together <S%G4883><s%> grows <S%G837><s%> to an holy <S%G40><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> in the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>
In whom <S%G3739><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> are built <S%G4925><s%> together <S%G4925><s%> for an habitation <S%G2732><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
